page.title: 18GOVERNMENT & HEALTH CARE
page.content: There is a{Parish Council}composed of 5 elected members from the East side and 5 members from the West side. The Council meets once a month, usually on a Thursday evening. The administration of{Education}is from County Hall at Northallerton. The local council office is at Pickering. The rates are paid to Ryedale House at Malton. Most{hospital}cases go to Scarborough, some to York and some babies are born in Malton Hospital. The majority of people are registered with the four {doctors}in the Group Practise in Pickering as they have surgery twice a week in the School House at Rosedale. Some residents are registered with the doctors at Kirkbymoorside. The {Ambulance Station}is at Kirkbymoorside and the nearest{Fire Station}is at Pickering.
